programme.title: Into the Badlands

programme.title: Into the Badlands
programme.desc: Cuando Sunny asegura su escapa de la Fortaleza, Quinn comienza a sospechar, mientras que las decisiones de La Viuda la ponen en camino a un conflicto con Sunny y MK.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Los conflictos entre Alba y Altafulla se intensifican. Chile y Beni compiten por llevar a una invitada al despacho. Jacky, tras pasarse de copas, toma una decisión que transformará su relación con Altafulla.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Jacky confronta a todos en la casa para exigir la expulsión de Altafulla. Karime organiza una cita muy mexicana con la intención de espantar a José. Un invitado sorprende a todos, especialmente a Chile y Karime.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La llegada de Jey a la casa revive pasiones olvidadas en Jacky. Una nueva invitada llega con la intención de sabotear la relación entre Rocío y Santiago, mientras que dos invitadas deciden dejar la casa.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: El cumpleaños de Beni se descontrola, y Rocío acaba en un fuerte enfrentamiento. Isa recibe una llamada que la lleva a tomar una decisión inesperada, mientras que Alba y Altafulla logran reconciliarse.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Un juego sexual trae consecuencias negativas para Santiago y Rocío. Alba y Karime hacen oficial su compromiso. Chile cumple su promesa, y los rumores llevan a José y Santiago a un enfrentamiento.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Las vacaciones llegan a su fin y algunos invitados se despiden de la casa, mientras que una persona especial llega de sorpresa. Todos se preparan para la fiesta, pero para algunos, será la peor noche de sus vidas.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La fiesta final da inicio y los conflictos surgen de inmediato. Mientras algunos se divierten, otros ven cómo sus relaciones llegan a su fin. Poco a poco, todos comienzan a despedirse de la casa, marcando el cierre de unas vacaciones inolvidables.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Un grupo de desconocidos llega a habitar la misma casa para vivir un verano lleno de fiestas, desenfreno y locuras que mantendrán a la gente pegada a la pantalla para conocerlos.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Ya conoces a Fernando, Jawy, Tadeo, Caballero, Karime, Manelik, Joyce y Talía. Sabes de lo que son capaces, pero... ¿podrán TRABAJAR? No todo en la vida es reventón, amigos…

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Continúa el reventón en AcaShore ¡Esta vez es todos contra todos! Además: lecciones de modales con el Niño de la Selva… Noche de Cantobar y peleas en el Antro.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: ¿Te atreves a subirte a un barco con los chicos de Acapulco Shore? En este episodio: ¡reventón en el mar!

programme.desc: Continúa la escalada de locura en la casa: surf, sexo, palos, cuchillos y caídas en el quinto episodio de Acapulco Shore.

programme.desc: Sexo, sudor, desmadre y karaoke en el sexto episodio de AcaShore.

programme.desc: The Riviera is on fire and the Shore group can't catch a break. In the middle of it all, Potro and Karime sign a pact to maintain the peace in their friendship.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore: Antonio Leaves
programme.desc: Due to problems with his family in Mexico, Tony decides to leave the house. When Tadeo realizes there is a free room, he changes his schedule and announces to the group that he will be staying for the rest of the vacation.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore: The Letters
programme.desc: Mane and Jawy's relationship is hanging by a thread. Despite their love, they will say things to each other that are difficult to forgive.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore: Caguamero Banquet
programme.desc: Letters, pacts, galas, punches and other things don't let the group realize the obvious, the vacation is ending.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore: What I Leave and What I Take
programme.desc: The vacation has come to an end and the Shores say goodbye without knowing if they will ever be together again, but they're sure that they had an unforgettable vacation.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The holidays begin and on the first day in the Shore house, old and new members meet to start a holiday of madness. The return to the original house seems to have an effect on its inhabitants and new romances.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: After a wild first night, the Shore house decides to spend a quiet afternoon on the beach where they take the opportunity to talk about what happened the previous night and get to know each other better.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The new "Boss" arrives at the house and the Shores discover that their duties are not at all similar to what they expected. After a day of work, there's nothing better than a few drinks and what seemed like a quiet party, ends in a crazy night.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Dinners prepared entirely in one skillet are perfect for weeknight cooking. Less cleanup is one obvious benefit. A skillet also gives the cook a bit more control over cooking multiple elements.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity—it's one reason burgers and onion rings are often on bar menus. In a carbonnade, the beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted a streamlined version of roast chicken with plenty of stuffing to go around. First, we needed to solve the problem of cooking the stuffing to a safe temperature without drying out the delicate breast meat of the chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Boneless pork chops are lean and quick-cooking, making them ideal for weeknight meals. Pork tenderloin, which is also lean, has a somewhat fussy reputation, but you don't need to be a professional chef to cook tenderloin properly.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Christie Morrison makes host Bridget Lancaster Shashlik-Style Beef Kebabs. Tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of ground cumin. Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison Adjaruli Khachapuri.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison Grilled Jerk Chicken. Equipment expert Adam Ried reviews grill brushes. Christie Morrison makes Smoked Chicken Wings.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Christie Morrison and host Julia Collin Davison make Pork Carnitas. Tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of lard. Julia makes Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Christie Morrison makes host Bridget Lancaster iconic Sliders. Tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Julia Collin Davison to a tasting of ketchup. Bryan Roof makes Julia Croque Monsieur.

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make Cheesy Stuffed Shells. Equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for 13 by 9-inch broiler-safe baking dishes. Bryan Roof makes Julia Eggplant Pecorino.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan Roof makes host Bridget Lancaster One-Batch Fried Chicken. Tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Julia Collin Davison to a tasting of strawberry spreads. Christie Morrison makes North Carolina Cheese Biscuits.

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia cooks sheet-pan lemon-herb cod fillets with crispy garlic potatoes, green beans with cilantro sauce (mtsvane lobio kindzis satsebelit), and an easy summer berry cake.

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia whips up simple pan-seared scallops, a delicious white bean-salami salad, and easy garlic and herb breadsticks.

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia makes pan-seared strip steak with persillade sauce and a simple salad with make-ahead lemon-garlic-chive vinaigrette.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We make a fresh-tasting, quick tamale pie with a juicy, spicy mixture of meat and vegetables and a quick homemade-cornbread topping. We also show you how to cook up a really flavorful chicken stew topped with a biscuit crust.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Whether we admit it or not, there are some dishes that are a little too high in fat and calories to be enjoyed on a regular basis. Even a modest portion of macaroni and cheese or chicken Parmesan is prohibitive. But that doesn't need to be the case.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to be able to serve English-style fish and chips—large pieces of moist and delicate cod in a crisp and tender coating with thick-cut fries—at home.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Commonly found at catered events, this once-highbrow dish has become a bit of a joke. But after preparing several cookbook versions, we realized that pairing a crisp-fried coating with a delicate butter sauce was a great idea that deserved a revival.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: While the hallmark of this filet mignon is its tender texture, some argue that the beefy flavor is too mild, lacking the oomph of fattier cuts like rib eye. So we aim to boost the filet mignon's flavor with a peppercorn crust and a rich pan sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We love a good stir-fry served with rice, but a noodle cake, a savory round of tender noodles sautéed in a skillet until the exterior is crisp, is also a great base for a saucy stir-fry.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We prepare a Thai-inspired beef stir-fry and share a recipe for great potstickers.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una chica de 18 años escapa de una casa suburbana donde estuvo cautiva por años con otras dos mujeres, el UAC busca al sospechoso que las secuestró.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC lleva a cabo una búsqueda en Los Ángeles después de que el equipo descubre imágenes de seguridad que muestran a un sospechoso siendo invitado a las casas de las víctimas.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una tormenta masiva embarca al equipo de NCIS en el USS Borealis, donde todos se convierten en sospechosos una vez que la escena del crimen revela que la Madre Naturaleza no era la única responsable.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una reservista Naval acude al equipo de NCIS luego de volver a su casa y encontrar el living de su casa ensangrentado y a su esposo desaparecido.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras que el equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un oficial del Mossad en Virginia, Tony y Ziva viajan a Berlín para rastrear al asesino de su padre.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Consecuencias del pasado
programme.desc: Danny y Baez buscan a una banda de ladrones en una ola de crímenes, y se unen al detective Jimmy Mosley, quien años atrás rompió el corazón de Baez.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Hacia lo inimaginable
programme.desc: El asesino en serie Thomas Wilder desafía a Danny con un mensaje en su última víctima, convirtiendo el juego del gato y el ratón en una venganza personal.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La milla extra

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 04/17/2015. Home to a dazzling array of animals, Bill Weir visits the Everglades to skim the waters, dive the swamp and meet its extraordinary residents.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/07/2017. What’s the best way to protect paradise? In stunning Patagonia, an American conservationist has purchased vast tracts of land to the fury of local developers.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/14/2017. As deforestation rages and unique species vanish, the fight is on to save one of the planet’s most special places before it is ruined forever.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 6/19/2016. At the height of the Cold War, the CIA recruited a Soviet diplomat with the code name TRIGON to gain valuable intelligence from inside the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Declassified

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 7/10/2016. The FBI and Defense Intelligence Agency join forces to catch Ana Montes, a senior DIA analyst who was passing sensitive intelligence to Cuba.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A detective is injured after chasing a man driving a stolen car, a bar fight ends with a couple in handcuffs, and an officer finds a variety of items during a vehicle search.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A couple assaults a tow lot employee who won't release their car, a suspicious man catches a patrol's attention, and police detain a carload of suspected shoplifters.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Oklahoma man's effort to evade units goes up in flames, officers use a beanbag gun on an armed suspect, and deputies intervene in a couple's grocery dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain. Deputies search for a mysterious driver who fled a car crash.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers assist in rescuing a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with the extraction of a man from his vehicle after a car wreck. An officer spots an apartment fire.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man suspected of shoplifting attempts to ditch his clothes, and officers respond to a dispute between a shopkeeper and a man suspected of paying with counterfeit money.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An unruly man gives deputies a hard time, witnesses call the cops when a well-dressed driver plows through multiple barricades, and a domestic call takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A biker with a history of stealing vehicles doesn’t know how to drive his motorcycle. A man in- between jobs takes up a sketchy method of earning money. Deputies strongly question the legitimacy of a man’s work van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Three male suspects are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at a nearby apartment complex. An officer is alarmed when she discovers an older male is the boyfriend of a teenager.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young carjacking suspect in custody gets a tongue-lashing from his mom and aunt, a man terrorizing his mom gets tased, and police give chase to a familiar vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver takes his unsuspecting passenger on a wild ride as he tries to evade police, a man's date is cut short by a traffic stop, and police are called to evict a roommate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man apologizes profusely after leading an officer on a foot chase, a passenger in a car chase tells conflicting tales, and police find a wanted man on a roof.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman leads police on a dangerous chase, a driver is remorseful for the damage he's caused, and a man's denial of solicitation is undermined by his open fly.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police go off-roading to follow a stolen car, a man has odd excuses for having suspicious items, and an officer settles a dispute between a wife and her jealous husband.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A fleet-footed deputy nabs a suspect on the run, officers responding to a domestic call are refused entry, and police try to ascertain the cause of a woman's hallucinations.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspected car thief's claims of innocence are undermined by a video he shot of himself earlier that day, and the pursuit of a suspected drunk driver has a surprising end.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads officers on a frantic foot-chase, deputies assist two teens in tracking down a man who stole their bike, and a dispute between roommates takes a dark turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to curb a stolen vehicle, a parolee at large speeds away with a two-month-old in the car, and officers try to determine the details of a stabbing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: COPS

programme.desc: La víctima era querida y exitosa, lo cual hace que la brutalidad del crimen sea más difícil de entender.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Marcado de por vida
programme.desc: Un hombre que había cometido delitos, incluido el asesinato, no fue capturado. Casi 50 años después, los avances en la tecnología y el análisis de la escritura descubrieron al criminal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando el secretario de la corte, Peter Porco, no se presenta a trabajar en noviembre de 2004, se ordena a un oficial de la corte que se dirija a la casa familiar de los Porcos en Bethlehem, Nueva York.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una mujer muere mientras paseaba a sus perros por el bosque. Como no tenía enemigos y su marido tiene una coartada, la policía asume que fue un accidente de caza.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación de un saco de dormir desechado, que contiene zapatillas de deporte ensangrentadas y un bolso, lleva a la policía al cuerpo de una mujer joven.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Lisa Manderach y su hija Devon dejaron su casa para ir de compras, pero no regresaron a la hora que se esperaba. El esposo de Lisa, Jimmy, llamó a la policía lleno de pánico para denunciar su desaparición y los dirigió a un centro comercial cercano.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Lleno de humo
programme.desc: Cuando una pareja de ancianos murió en un sospechoso incendio en casa, su hijo se convirtió en el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Testigo presencial
programme.desc: Una adolescente desapareció después de una noche de paseos a caballo. Su cuerpo fue encontrado un mes después, a cinco kilómetros de su casa.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Fue uno de los casos más inusuales en la historia forense. Los investigadores tuvieron que encontrar una manera de resolver un caso de asesinato con una evidencia que consistía en un tomate aplastado encontrado en la escena del crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un profesor de gimnasia de secundaria abandona misteriosamente la ciudad sin despedirse de nadie.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 47 hopefuls learn the mechanics of the kickline, a rookie's injuries put her out of commission, and choreographer Evan Miller teaches a dance routine that calls for power and precision.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With nine cuts looming before the team's first game, the hopefuls show off their freestyle dancing, get fit for their official uniforms and learn new choreography from Denise Dicharry.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Choreographer Criscilla Anderson uses her cancer battle to inspire the dancers, veteran mentors offer style tips to the rookies, and Travis Wall helps Judy and Kelli make their next cut.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The hopefuls practice the highly precise entrance routine and jump kicks for the first time, Jordann shares a vulnerable personal story, and Judy and Kelli make two more tough cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the remaining ladies try out for the media-savvy Show Group, Judy and Kelli are faced with yet another difficult decision, and some dancers rise to glory while others' hearts are broken.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Makeovers give the dancers renewed confidence, alum Yuko shares exciting personal news, veteran Lisa makes a hard decision, and Kelli questions Alora-Rose about a rumored distraction.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week nine of training camp intensifies when Kelli and Judy confront Alora-Rose and deliberate squad dismissal decisions one week before the first game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy slyly make the final squad announcement, and the new team faces several obstacles before taking the field for their first game as Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds will audition but only 45 girls will secure a spot in the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders training camp. DCC director Kelli Finglass presides over the process with a keen eye for talent and beauty.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Training camp gets underway as the girls are introduced to a grueling schedule of dance rehearsals with choreographer Judy Trammell and fitness instructor Jay Johnson.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Reality sets in and the mental and physical stress of training camp hits the girls hard.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Super Bowl XXX MVP Larry Brown and current Dallas Cowboy Ryan Fowler school the training camp candidates with the ultimate football challenge. The girls are tested on their NFL knowledge and athletic skills on the field.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Beauty is the name of the game as the training camp candidates get major hair makeovers in preparation for their first solo publicity stills. But not everyone is picture perfect and by the end of the week, there will be a heartbreaking elimination.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The end of training camp is just around the corner and after Kelli's annual etiquette luncheon the girls are on their best behavior. A tough new choreographer introduces the girls to real dance technique with devastating results.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The candidates find themselves in front of the camera for a crash course in how to deal with the media. The judges from the open call are brought back to have their final say.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The summer is coming to a close, and there are now 36 girls poised to become America's sweethearts. Kelli and Judy are concerned the team is not ready and there may have to be more cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of excited and anxious Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders hopefuls arrive at Texas Stadium for the preliminary auditions. After performing their freestyle dance routines for the judges, only half make it to the semi-finals.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco and Ellie are the best of friends. But Ellie is starting to want more…Marco though can’t seem to respond in kind. He’s more and more confused about what and who he’s looking for…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When class clown JT acts up in Science class, his teacher Ms. Hatzilakos gives him a serious detention - assisting her with the guinea pigs all week. JT’s annoyed.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are looking up for Sean. He and Emma are back together. He’s a star on the basketball team. And he and Jimmy have buried the hatchet. Jimmy’s even invited him to a party. But the good feelings don’t last for long.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Liberty can’t believe it when she doesn’t make the Girls Floor Hockey team – she’s never failed at anything. So when Coach Hatzilakos asks her to be the Team Manager, Liberty throws all her energy into managing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley and Jimmy are back together, but it doesn’t feel quite the same. Ash may not look the same as last year – she’s a Goth now – but Jimmy’s sure she’s still the same golden girl inside.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma’s mom is away for a few days and it’s just her and her step-dad, Mr. Simpson. He’s supportive of Emma’s involvement in “Food for Thought”; the student group who wants to remove genetically modified (GM) foods from the school cafeteria.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After being in counseling for a long time, Paige is positive she’s recovered from her date rape. In fact, she’s convinced her life is back to normal – Dean and what he did are behind her forever. She never wants to see him again, so she’s dismissive.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s exam time and everyone’s stressed – especially Craig. In a surprise visit from his father, Craig learns that his dad is very eager to have him back in his life.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Although his father is gone, Craig wants to get on with his life as normal. He insists on going back to school immediately and becomes frustrated with his friends when they behave with concern.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The pending birth a new baby for Spike and Snake inspires Emma to search for her birth father. With some detective work, Emma discovers that her father, Shane, lives just outside the city.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner just can’t deal with the fact that Marco’s gay so he tries to cut Marco out of life. But when the guys all go to see Dylan’s hockey game, Jimmy makes sure that Marco comes along.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are pretty hot between Craig and Ashley, but he’s disappointed that she keeps pulling back from going all the way.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Life’s getting more and more stressful for Ellie—her dad just left on another Peacekeeping Mission, her mom’s drinking again and she’s interning for Caitlin Ryan’s tv show. As things get more and more hectic, Ellie has no one to help her cope.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma decides it’s time to move on in matters of the heart when she realizes she has feelings for new kid Chris.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Terri’s in heaven-- not only does she have a terrific boyfriend, the wonderful romantic Rick, she also has the lead in the school play!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s a big gymnastics meet at Degrassi, and Manny’s going to lead the team to gold! But when she starts to feel sick, she fears that her queasy stomach might be more than the flu or even a bad nerves.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve gets freaky on a mission to find the weirdest dinosaur ever. He kick-starts with a Gigantoraptor, an 8 metre tall giant that laid the biggest eggs in history.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve discovers just what it takes to be a terror from the skies. He straps himself into one of Britain's fastest wind tunnels where he goes head to head against Microraptor.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve travels to new depths as he discovers just what it takes to be an aquatic terror. His quest sees him rocket through water in spectacular style, just like an Opthalmosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve's on a mission to find dinosaurs that have something a little special: fearsome killers, with incredible abilities! Get ready for a sensory sensation! His quest sees him race in the dark like a Troodon.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve goes on an undercover mission to unearth the sneakiest dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on the hunt for the most deadly animals to have ever walked the earth, dinosaurs. Steve goes on a mission to uncover what was deadlier than the dinosaurs, from monsoons and super-sized sandstorms to ballistic bacteria and gory gas.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall looks back at the most awesome experiments over the series and chooses his highlights.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the leaellynasaura and the tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord
programme.desc: As the Possidor Ambassador visits, Sil is appalled to realise Crozier has selected Peri to be the Kiv's new host body - a move Yrcanos takes exception to with devastating results.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord
programme.desc: The Doctor and Mel are taking a rest aboard the Hyperion III when a series of murders lead them to suspect there is more to Professor Laskey's party than it initially appears...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord
programme.desc: The Vervoids begin to attack the crew and passengers, while someone kills a Mogarian who isn't really a Mogarian at all, but an old friend of the Doctor's...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord
programme.desc: The Commadore loses command of his ship as Bruchner takes over the bridge, intending to send the Hyperion III into the black hole of Tartarus to destroy the Vervoids forever.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord
programme.desc: The Valeyard's true identity is revealed and the trial aborted, but the Doctor and Mel must pursue his new enemy into the Matrix itself, where nothing is quite what it seems…

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord

programme.title: Doctor Who: Paradise Towers
programme.desc: The legendary Paradise Towers is supposed to be the height of luxury but when the Doctor and Mel arrive, they find it is as far from a paradise as possible.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Paradise Towers
programme.desc: With the Doctor condemned to death by the caretakers and their bizarre rulebook, Mel faces cannibalistic OAPS. Is Pex going to be the true hero of Paradise Towers?

programme.title: Doctor Who: Paradise Towers
programme.desc: Mel and Pex play cat and mouse with the lethal cleaner robots while the Doctor and the surviving Kangs learn all about Kroagnon the Great Architect.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Paradise Towers
programme.desc: Kroagnon has been reborn, and is using the Chief Caretaker’s reanimated corpse to move around Paradise Towers. To stop him the Doctor must teach the residents teamwork.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Dragonfire

programme.title: Doctor Who: Dragonfire

programme.title: Doctor Who: Dragonfire

programme.title: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks
programme.desc: Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol

programme.desc: Thom Hunt meets a man who claims to have a skull capable of withstanding extreme forces; Li Xin demonstrates this by performing a headstand on the tip of a nine-inch nail.

programme.title: Jungle Planet
programme.desc: The huge expanses of olive groves around the Mediterranean region are a humanized forest where trees grow in an orderly manner.

programme.title: Frontier Vets
programme.desc: Charlotte has growing cynicism towards the owner of the emaciated black dog, when he repeatedly dodges his responsibility. Charlotte and Roxy set out on a house call to investigate.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: This episode of Aging in the Wild brings a light-hearted look at the issue of sexuality and camaraderie in older animals. We illustrate, for example, the link between the age of an elephant and its reproductive success.

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI DESTINATIONS
programme.desc: Kavinga Safari Camp

programme.title: Peace Parks
programme.desc: In this series we follow the trail of the Transfrontier Parks bordering on South Africa and extending into neighbouring countries. We explore why these conservation areas are important and what they protect.

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI DESTINATIONS
programme.desc: Changa Safari Camp

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI ENCOUNTERS
programme.desc: Kristina travels back to Zimbabwe's stunning lake Kariba. This time she's touring the area on the luxurious Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser. Joined by fishing experts, Craig and Mark, she attempts to catch the infamous tiger fish.

programme.title: Singapore's Field Of Dreams
programme.desc: This is an engineering story about building the world's ultimate multi-function sports complex.

programme.title: Desert Islands Of The Middle East
programme.desc: Episode 2

programme.title: Jungle Planet
programme.desc: Life on Earth is characterized by its enormous richness. Even today, much of its surface is covered with forests and jungles.

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI ENCOUNTERS
programme.desc: In this final episode, Kristina shares her favourite highlights, humour or behind the scenes action from each of the 19 safari locations. It has indeed been an epic safari with encounters to remember for a lifetime.

programme.title: Scotland From The Sky
programme.desc: In the last episode of the landmark series, Scotland From The Sky explores how aerial photography has revealed Scotland's hidden ancient past and uncovered secrets buried right beneath our feet.

programme.title: Wild Colombia With Nigel Marven
programme.desc: Nigel Marven explores Colombia's Pacific coast, which is home to giant geckos, glowing beetles and some bright and vividly coloured frogs.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: Nicole and Jess investigate the circumstances surrounding a man with a gunshot wound to the head and found in the trunk of a car.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: Antonio finally gets closure with his ex-wife.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: After their mother is arrested, twins Janelle and Tal are sent to live with their Uncle Al in Atlanta, where Janelle learns about the High Water performing arts school in their new neighborhood.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Forced outsider her comfort zone, Janelle struggles at her High Water audition; Tal confronts his bullies.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Tal battles to keep up with his new classmates; Sage makes an unexpected announcement; Davis is faced with a family issue that could derail his future.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Janelle and Dondre can't seem to hide their true feelings; alliances at High Water are challenged.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Sage's troubles start trending; Dondre discovers that Janelle has been keeping a secret from him.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Odalie finds out why Davis has been skipping class; King's loyalties are torn; Tal finally makes a move on his crush.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Kevin and Charity begin divorce proceedings, but the circumstances are exacerbated when Lady Mae learns the truth about Kevin; Grace and Darius's relationship reaches a stalemate.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: The anniversary of Faith's death is at hand and Grace shows no sign of giving up her pursuit of Mac; Triumph Pastor Basie Skanks and Jacob receive bad news regarding Triumph Two's finances.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Jacob makes Basie an offer to clear his debt and gain full control of Triumph II; Mac receives bad news from Skip Leonard, which puts him an explosive collision course with Grace.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Grace and Mac's showdown sends shockwaves through the family; Jacob offers the Bishop an olive branch; Kevin makes a decision that leaves Charity reeling.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Jacob and Kerissa establish their new ministry; Charity desperately tries to reach Kevin; Darius gets an offer that may take him out of Memphis, leaving Grace to wonder where she fits in his life.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: When Sophia and Zora are excluded from the upcoming debutante Cotillion, Lady Mae sets out to make things right; Grace is inspired by Basie's sermon; Charity reaches out to Carlton.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Angela searches for the mole; Ghost works to regain the club deal; Kanan exerts a dark influence upon Tariq; Milan warns Tommy about the price of betrayal.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be bound face to face by their wrists to a poll attached to a plexi-glass platform. Contestants are placed into a Plexiglas helmet filled with spiders. Couples will be standing and bound by their ankles to a platform attached to a lever.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be strapped by their waist, ankles, and wrist and locked to the face of a wheel, halfway into the water. Contestants will shoot at wall of bottles with a paintball gun. Contestant must stand on a swaying platform hanging from a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will walk across a truss suspended above the ground wearing a chain mail suit. Contestants will shoot a flaming arrow from a cross bow at a scarecrow target. Contestant is secured into an upright coffin, filled with bugs.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will climb out of the moving tram and grab a net attached to the tram. Contestants will drink a shake consisting of rats. A plexi-glass wall with a lip hangs under the helicopter and they must traverse the wall releasing flags along the way.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be standing on opposite platforms suspended in the air. Contestants will be locked in a cage and hung from a crane. Contestant will have to siphon fluid out of containers and into a funnel. A contestant will cross a beam above ground.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Poles will be attached and hung off the dump truck off the ground. Plexiglas box is buried in the sand and filled with water and sand. Contestants will be standing on a car that is suspended over the water by a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be standing on top of a platform that covers a water tank. A blindfolded contestant is guided by their partner's verbal commands to a tank filled with leeches. Contestants will be standing a tube that is suspended in the air from a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be standing on the platform that is suspended. Contestants will lick bugs off of ropes. A glass tube is suspended vertically from a crane with the top sealed and the bottom open and submerges in a pool.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be in a dingy that is being towed by a net attached to the back end of the schooner. Contestants will be standing on a plank above the water. Contestants have Thanksgiving dinner. Contestant will start on a platform above the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be bound to a chair, that will be suspend over the water. Dressed in a dog bite protection suit, contestants must climb out of a specially designed chimney and into an enclosed room. Contestant must drive their car towards a pipe ramp.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are standing on top of one of two semi trucks traveling. Contestants will play a game to determine how many disgusting donuts they will have to eat. Contestants will be standing on a truss structure that is above the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For years, a woman suffered from what appeared to be the unpleasant side effects of lithium, a drug prescribed to treat bipolar disorder. When she died, investigators had to determine if her death was due to natural causes, suicide or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After 10 bodies turn up in Florida, one victim — 17-year-old Lisa McVey — is abducted but released. She leads police to the perpertrator, Bobbie Joe Long.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Seattle police had no suspects in the violent murder of grunge singer Mia Zapata. More than a decade passed before evidence collected by a prescient medical examiner could be used by forensic scientists to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In this classic episode of Forensic Files, the longest-running true crime series in television history, Eileen and Derrick Severs disappear from their home in a small village in Great Britain and police find evidence of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the series premiere of "Forensic Files", the longest-running true crime series in history, a Connecticut flight attendant goes missing. Police suspect her husband is guilty of murder, but can they prove it?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman falls to her death from a cliff overlooking the ocean. Initially, investigators think it was a tragic accident. But after a forensic examination, police uncover a very different picture of what happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One warm summer afternoon, the town of Verona, Wisconsin faced its first triple homicide. To solve the case, investigators had to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears and her husband becomes the prime suspect — especially after police find a huge bloodstain on the carpet of their bedroom. When they spray the bedroom with Luminol, they discover it was awash with blood spatter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Scott Dunn goes missing, police spray his bedroom with Luminol and uncover a scene of horrific violence. Now investigators face a daunting task: proving that Scott Dunn had been murdered without a body, a witness or a murder weapon.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1971, John List left a note with the bodies of his mother, wife and three children in his mansion ballroom before disappearing completely. Detectives must solve the case, despite having only an outdated photograph of List.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fifteen-year-old boy dies from a mysterious gunshot wound to the head while sitting in the lobby of his father's gun club. Ballistics, laser technology, made-to-scale models and the latest in forensic animation are used to find the cause.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors cannot pinpoint the source of a businessman's illness.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/17/2021: Ozzie Albies and Austin Riley come up clutch to tie the game in the 8th inning, then postseason hero Eddie Rosario hits the walk-off single in the 9th to take down the Dodgers in Game 2 of the National League Championship Series.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/19/2021: The Astros take down the Red Sox, 9-2, in Game 4 of the ALCS. With the game tied going into the 9th inning, Houston scores seven runs, highlighted by run-scoring singles from Jason Castro, Yordan Álvarez, Carlos Correa and Kyle Tucker.

programme.title: Great Games: All-Star
programme.desc: The 1986 All-Star Game resulted in an American League win that ended the National League's streak of winning the last 13 of 14 All-Star Games. Lou Whitaker and Frank White homered in the AL's 3-2 victory and Roger Clemens was named MVP.

programme.title: Inside the Moments
programme.desc: On this episode of Inside the Moments, take a look at some of the icons that transcended the game of baseball, featuring Jackie Robinson, Satchel Paige, and more.

programme.title: MLB Docs
programme.desc: Hunter Pence won two World Series titles with the Giants and over his 12-year career appeared in four All-Star Games. After a tough 2018 season in San Francisco, it seemed unlikely Pence would return to the Majors until he was able to recreate his game.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/26/2021: Jorge Soler and Adam Duvall homer to lead the Braves to a 6-2 win over the Astros in Game 1 of the 2021 World Series.

programme.title: MST3K: Teenage Caveman
programme.desc: In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

programme.desc: A group of aliens land on Earth and decide to use the planet as a farm for their livestock. One of the aliens rebels and flees to a small town, where he is pursued by another alien who kills anyone in his path.

programme.title: MST3K: The Crawling Hand
programme.desc: Joel and the Bots have a tough time agreeing on how to spend their free time between segments of the teen sci-fi thriller "The Crawling Hand".

programme.title: MST3K: The Dead Talk Back
programme.desc: Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.

programme.title: MST3K: The Giant Spider Invasion
programme.desc: Mike and the 'bots suffer through The Giant Spider Invasion (1975).

programme.title: MST3K: The Painted Hills
programme.desc: A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.

programme.desc: Two laid back detectives crack down on an underground porn ring while Frank threatens to blow up Deep 13.

programme.desc: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!

programme.desc: The team searches for a billionaire's estranged wife and their children after the yacht they were last seen boarding is found adrift in the harbor—with only its dead captain aboard.

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: Vivian and the team search for a blind teen and her mobility instructor who were abducted during a camping trip. Meanwhile, Jack's wife, Maria, informs him that she wants a divorce.

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: While searching for a missing nurse's aide, Maureen Grady, the team discovers that this seemingly all-American woman is actually a fugitive wanted for bombing an abortion clinic.

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After eight people are fatally poisoned at a deli in New York City, special agents Maggie Bell and OA Zidan trace the crime to an unlikely culprit and conduct a sting operation to prevent further attacks.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Special Agent Maggie Bell, Special Agent OA Zidan, and the team investigate the murders of 18 young women with help from a survivor associated with the deceased.

programme.title: Lila & Eve
programme.desc: Lila, a grief-stricken mother reeling from her son's murder, attends a support group where she meets Eve, who urges her to take matters into her own hands to track down her son's killers. They soon embark on a journey of revenge, but also recovery.

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.
When a student writes the police code for homicide, 187, inside a textbook owned by teacher Trevor Garfield, he feels threatened.

programme.title: The Kill Room

programme.title: Out of Time

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda
programme.desc: Kevin Kline won the Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his role in this wildly popular comedy about an intricate diamond heist that's peppered with the comical antics of Jamie Lee Curtis and John Cleese.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: King of New York
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Hendrix (2000)

programme.title: Night Catches Us

programme.desc: In a Sicilian town an aspiring poet in search of inspiration meets a folk singer.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

programme.title: Simply Ming

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain A Cook's Tour

programme.title: Hitler's Women
programme.desc: Women have been among the strongest pillars of Hitlerism from its very inception. If some historians underline the complicity between women and the government, others present them as victims of propaganda and Nazi Population Policy.

programme.title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Hitler and the Beer Hall Putsch
programme.desc: One of the great ironies of history that Hitler’s first assignment after the Great War was to help the Bavarian army to identify extremist political parties, then to infiltrate and report back.

programme.title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Hitler the Drifter
programme.desc: Drawing upon the often overlooked memoirs of his erstwhile friend Reinhardt Hanisch and revisiting the key sites on his journey, this powerful film traces Hitler’s wilderness years in Vienna and Munich.

programme.title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Private Hitler's War
programme.desc: Why, at the height of the battle for France in 1940, was Hitler driven to step aside from the battle to visit the graves of his fallen comrades and lead the General Staff on a tour of his old trenches from the Great War?

programme.title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Hitler, Himler, and the Occult
programme.desc: The link between Hitler, the esoteric mystical movement of the nineteenth century, and the Aryan mythology of the Waffen SS is finally established.

programme.title: The Vatican and the Third Reich
programme.desc: In the midst of WWII, Catholics looked to the pope to guide them. Hitler had already begun secretly launching his plan to exterminate the Jews of Europe.

programme.title: Occult History of the Third Reich
programme.desc: The swastika was adopted by the Nazi Party in 1920, but it was neither the Party's invention nor its discovery.

programme.title: Occult History of the Third Reich

programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.desc: Helen Hunt stars in the mind-twisting psychological thriller. The lead investigator on a missing persons case struggles to balance work and home life. But when the family is put in mortal danger, an evil truth about their home is finally uncovered.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism Part II
programme.desc: Nell is back in the safety of civilization and sent to live in a group home where she's encouraged to leave her past behind and start a new life. Just as Nell settles in, she is tormented by the seductive demonic presence that once possessed her.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Following a mysterious disappearance on a jump, a group of skydivers experience paranormal occurrences that leave them fighting for their lives.

programme.title: American Beauty

programme.title: The Mod Squad

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One Team is stranded in Indonesia as they watch their competition race by, and two Teams join forces to push through a mind-numbing mental challenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams struggle with an underwater challenge which threatens their positions in the game, and one team’s love for the outdoors comes in handy during a tough climbing challenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Malawi where a puzzling patriotic Roadblock causes one team to fall behind. Also, with a Double U-Turn on the line, teams must choose whether to sabotage their fellow Racers for a chance at first place.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After a potentially game-changing error, one team hopes for a lucky break, and donning only a Speedo for their Detour task, Racers get in touch with their inner exhibitionists.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams make their way to Panama City, where they come face-to-face with their fears as they take in astonishing views of the city skyline.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After racing through 4 continents, 20 cities and nearly 40,000 miles, the final three teams race to Atlanta, Ga., where a smooth landing evades one team as their competition soars.
